advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A denial of service issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Jannik Lorenz of SEEMOO @ TU Darmstadt

advisories.impact: A malicious application could interact with system processes to access private information and perform privileged actions
advisories.description: An entitlement parsing issue was addressed with improved parsing.

cves.credit: Linus Henze (pinauten.de)

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Yu Zhou (@yuzhou6666) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Zhou (@yuzhou6666) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted text message may lead to application denial of service
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

cves.credit: Aaron Perris (@aaronp613), an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, Carlos S Tech, Sam Menzies of Sam’s Lounge, Sufiyan Gouri of Lovely Professional University, India, Suleman Hasan Rathor of Arabic-Classroom.com

advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted PDF file may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Peter Nguyen Vu Hoang of STAR Labs working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Samuel Groß of Google Project Zero

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine another application's memory layout
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

cves.credit: Tao Huang and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to cause unexpected system termination or write kernel memory
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read kernel memory
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue existed resulting in memory corruption. This was addressed with improved state management.

Xinru Chi and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to overwrite existing files
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may cause a denial of service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.
